item.title: Spark: many ways to do the same thing
item.description: Spark lets you do things in many different ways – Scala, Python, or Java; RDDs, Dataframes, Datasets, SparkSQL each have their own APIs and idioms; you can fiddle with a bunch of parameters, and of course you can decide to pre-process your data.

item.title: Unit testing Spark Scala code
item.description: Unit tests. They’re a good thing. I use them even in single-person projects, because I like being able to double-check my own logic, and because it’s less effort to run a couple tests than to remember the way my code interacts with my other code every time I make a change.
